reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is an amazing professor. His lectures are engaging, and he genuinely cares about his students.

reviews.subject: Advanced Calculus
reviews.review: The course is challenging, but Dr. Johnson explains concepts clearly. However, the exams are quite difficult.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's lectures are well-organized and informative, but the workload is heavy.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: The lectures are a bit dry, and it's hard to stay focused. The grading is fair, though.

reviews.subject: Computer Science 101
reviews.review: Dr. Williams is very knowledgeable and always willing to help. His assignments are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Philosophy of Mind
reviews.review: Dr. Davis presents thought-provoking ideas, but her lectures can be hard to follow at times.

reviews.subject: Physics II
reviews.review: The course content is interesting, but Dr. Miller's teaching style is not very engaging.

reviews.subject: Sociology 101
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is passionate about the subject and encourages class participation.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Moore explains complex concepts in a simple way. His classes are always interesting.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: The lectures are not very interactive, and the exams are tough. It's hard to keep up with the material.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Anderson makes literature come alive. His enthusiasm is contagious.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: The course is well-structured, but Dr. Thomas's explanations can be confusing.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Jackson is knowledgeable and presents the material in an engaging way. His exams are fair.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Ethics
reviews.review: Dr. White is an excellent professor. Her lectures are insightful, and she encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: The course content is interesting, but Dr. Martinez's lectures are monotonous and hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. Clark explains the material well and is always available for questions.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez is passionate about the subject and inspires his students to care about the environment.

reviews.subject: Spanish 101
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is a good instructor, but the pace of the course is very fast.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Marketing
reviews.review: Dr. Walker's classes are interesting, and he provides real-world examples to explain concepts.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry Lab
reviews.review: The lab is disorganized, and the instructions are not clear. It can be frustrating at times.
